identity: John Lin is a 25-year-old easy-going, confident, and competitive pharmacist who prioritizes his family. He is married to Mei Lin and has a young son named Eddy. When not working at Willows Market and Pharmacy, John unwinds by taking a walk or exercising after a long day. With a daily routine that balances work and personal life, he values spending time with his loved ones, as evident from his evening video calls with Mei Lin and Eddy during their vacation in Alfter, Germany.
